successStories.testimonial: We are deeply grateful to the MITS Foundation for their steadfast support and invaluable guidance in incubating our company. Their mentorship, resources, and strategic insights have played a crucial role in shaping our path toward innovation and success.
The MITS incubation center is supportive, offering guidance and resources to startups. While they provide assistance, the level of support may vary depending on the project's needs.

CreoMind Innovations, my startup, has been incubated at the MITS Foundation, providing a strong platform for innovation in Education Technology. The foundationâ€™s support has been instrumental in fostering our growth and impact in the field of Data Science and Analytics education.
